title: Sister O'dell, Shaq in NYC, Steve on Watch, Trump Tweet and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Shaq in NYC, Steve on Watch, Trump Tweet and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big ups to those that still have their Christmas lights still up. Uncle Steve got the new iPhone 11. Sister O'dell makes her first appearance of 2020. Shaq saves a woman's life in NYC. George Lopez in hot water over comment about Trump. Lizzo and DaBaby are both frustrated with social media. Donald Trump gets more and more direct with his tweets angering many. There is a survey out there that makes a funny observation regarding people's new years resolutions. The crew encourage all to check out Steve on Watch on Facebook for daily highlights. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about ups and downs in life and makes a simple recommendation, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
